pr_title: mgmt, delete deprecated class PagedList, and methods in storage, appservice, network

timeline.message: remove deprecated method in storage, network, appservice

timeline.bodyText: It looks there is already existing StorageAccountSkuType.STANDARD_GRS.
timeline.author: xseeseesee

timeline.bodyText: Maybe better same change for tests and samples.
timeline.author: xseeseesee

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-compute/src/test/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/compute/VirtualMachineOperationsTests.java b/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-compute/src/test/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/compute/VirtualMachineOperationsTests.java
index 6ef8b14e23b..0a5f442f590 100644
--- a/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-compute/src/test/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/compute/VirtualMachineOperationsTests.java
+++ b/sdk/resourcemanager/azure-resourcemanager-compute/src/test/java/com/azure/resourcemanager/compute/VirtualMachineOperationsTests.java

@@ -676,7 +675,7 @@ public class VirtualMachineOperationsTests extends ComputeManagementTest {
                 .define(storageName)
                 .withRegion(region)
                 .withNewResourceGroup(rgName)
-                .withSku(StorageAccountSkuType.fromSkuName(SkuName.PREMIUM_LRS))
+                .withSku(StorageAccountSkuType.PREMIUM_LRS)
                 .create();
 
         // Creates a virtual machine with an unmanaged data disk that gets stored in the above

timeline.message: use enum instead of string to enum
